dict.string: $(PRODUCT_NAME) integrates with Apple Music to offer a curated tea playlist for a relaxing tea session. Granting access will allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your Apple Music library and provide you with a delightful musical ambiance while enjoying your tea.

$(PRODUCT_NAME) requires constant access to Bluetooth for seamless connectivity with smart tea devices and accessories. Granting access will ensure $(PRODUCT_NAME) can maintain a reliable and uninterrupted connection with your tea brewing equipment.

$(PRODUCT_NAME) utilizes Bluetooth to connect with smart tea devices and accessories. Granting access will enable $(PRODUCT_NAME) to enhance your tea experience by providing advanced features and controls for brewing tea.

$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your calendar to schedule tea reminders and events. Granting access will enable $(PRODUCT_NAME) to seamlessly integrate with your calendar and provide a personalized tea experience.

$(PRODUCT_NAME) requires access to your contacts to allow you to invite friends for tea gatherings and events. Granting access will enable $(PRODUCT_NAME) to provide a convenient way for you to connect and share your tea moments with others.

$(PRODUCT_NAME) uses your location to provide localized tea recommendations, tea-related events, and tea shop suggestions. Granting access will enable $(PRODUCT_NAME) to offer a personalized tea experience based on your location.

$(PRODUCT_NAME) utilizes motion data to detect your movements and gestures for interactive tea brewing experiences. Granting access will enable $(PRODUCT_NAME) to provide a unique and immersive way to interact with your tea brewing process.
This app requires access to the photo library to select and display photos
This app requires access to the photo library to select and display photos

$(PRODUCT_NAME) integrates with Siri to provide a hands-free tea experience. Granting access will enable $(PRODUCT_NAME) to work seamlessly with Siri, allowing you to use voice commands to control and manage your tea brewing process.

$(PRODUCT_NAME) supports speech recognition to enable voice commands for controlling tea brewing and settings. Granting access will allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to listen and respond to your voice instructions, enhancing the ease and convenience of using the app.
